resources.string:
□ Clover Paint released
 
 Newly developed is Clover Paint multiple layers and corresponding mask of selection, Cut, Paste in the selected range.
 If you need these advanced editing features, please consider purchasing.
 Paint version enhancements will continue in the future.
 (In memo versin are only scheduled to be introduced only common UI related improvements were added in the Paint version)

□ version 1.18
 
 - Added: New key configuration(Gallery>KeyConf.)
 It is very comprehensive, support full keyboard and gamepad
 - Deprecated:Clover list menu/back/vol↑/↓ button
 - Added: Create view>cam.Xxx setting clover
 - Added: Create Sel.tool>Edit>Xxx command clover
 - Other many minor bug fixes and adjustments

□ version 1.18.1
 
 - Bug fix: Transform/Move tool rebar displayed wrong locate while main menu button vanish
 - Bug fix: Error cell sometimes occur in the output image

□ version 1.18.2
 
 - Bug fix: Canvas break when filling with not full transparent
 - Bug fix: Button hit is difficult in some terminal

□ version 1.18.3
 
 - Added: Option of force touch event interval fixing(for the speed effect of a brush)
 - Bug fix: Copy&Paste was missing in the KeyConf
 - Other some minor bug fixes and adjustments

□ version 1.18.4
 
 - Speed Effect quality improvement of the Brush
 - Bug fix: Not detect stylus btn-1 at HTC Flyer

□ version 1.18.5
 
 - Bug fix: When Smoothing option is off, the Speed Effect generate wrong result

□ version 1.18.6
 
 - Bug fix: The cursor does not disappear in the Paint mode even if Hovering cursor option is off

□ version 1.18.7
 
 - Bug fix: In non-Fullscreen mode, The hovering cursor appear away from the nib of stylus in some terminals

□ version 1.19
 
 - Can use a part of the low-latency stroke drawing feature of the Clover SC in Clover Paint(※)
 [Brush… → Using one-shot undo]
 - Added: Create clover and shortcut of the canvas fill feature
 - Added: Can set the layer construction when you create a new canvas from the Gallery
 - Other some minor bug fixes and adjustments
 
 ※ It is a bonus feature of the Clover SC(donation). If you purchase the donation version, and once you are running it, will be open this feature.
 However, in the Clover Memo Lite version, it works even if you have not purchased a donation version for confirmation of the operation condition of the terminal in use.

□ version 1.19.5
 
 - Supported HEX3 Jaja Stylus
 (Need to install a plug-in. It is able to download from the Google play)

□ version 1.19.10
 
 - Added: High frequency Scan rate mode
 (If you need old type scan rate, Unchecked [Option > Scan rate])

□ version 1.19.20
 
 - Added codes measures, holding-shortcut problem of the Samsung terminal in the higher than JB
 - Bug fix: App is halt when return from sleep mode with other than the portrait mode

□ version 1.19.21
 
 - Fixed: All button icon and text is invisible on Android 4.3
 (This is the first aid. Currently, responding to Android 4.3 is not complete)

□ version 1.19.22
 
 - Some bug fixes

□ version 1.19.30
 
 - Modify:Current state of the brush is maintained also when you create the Clover in the list selected brush Clover
 - Modify:A brush Clover icon on the canvas began to ignore the position adjustment in the opening and closing of the window
 - Bug fix:Hang-up when you touch sandbox before first stroke drawing finished

□ version 1.19.31
 
 - Bug fix:Hang-up when call eyedropper clover

□ version 1.20
 
 ■ Implemented CBSv2(Clover Brush Synthesizer version 2)
 - User-defined texture pattern spot
 - Rotation of the spot
 - The effect of orientation and tilt of the stylus(for Cintiq)
 - …and more features and improvement
 - Import and Export of the brush
 - New built-in brush sets for CBSv2
 (These are only Clover Paint)
 
 - Advanced setting for system or brush cursor
 - Add a background pattern set to the default setting of the canvas

□ version 1.20.01
 
 - Bug fix of brush import

□ version 1.20.02
 
 - Fixed some bugs that occur in the KitKat
 - Some other bug fixes and improvements

□ version 1.20.03
 
 - Added "Move canvas" option to "Action on Canvas with Single finger" at the stylus settings

□ version 1.20.04
 
 - Changed calculate method of the screen layout

□ version 1.20.50
 
 - Implemented: Preview version of the EfT (Extension for Tablet)
 ※ Can use it if you purchase Clover SC(donation) and install it
 ※ This is a temporary measure. After implementation of official EfT, it is deleted
 ※ EfT is optimizing for a digitizer stylus.
 (EfT functions are need to setting the Option - [UI/View])

□ version 1.20.51
 
 - Improved: Synchronization process of the drawing
 - Bug fix: The raster-based draw-tools instability

□ version 1.20.52
 
 - Bug fix of the Move tool
 - Improved of the synchronous process of the the drawing thread

□ version 1.21
 
 ■ Implemented Extension for Tablet (EfT)
 - Add new UI for the tablet size terminal with digitizer stylus
 - It is necessary to purchase (2,000 yen) from the option setting to use it(can try it to January 31)
 (Clover Paint)

□ version 1.21.01
 - Bug fix: Halt at using Transform tool
 - Bug fix: Display of Clover icon docking
 - Bug fix: Display of floating window caption

□ version 1.21.05
 - [EfT] Implemented: [Shift Hue Circle] range bar was added to the Color picker
 - [EfT] Implemented: [Window trans-hide button] was added to the window option

□ version 1.22
 
 ■ Implemented Hand Shake Correction
 - Implement the Hand Shake Correction features with powerful customization
 (The option of the Hand Shake Correction is set by [Brush - Correct])
 (It is necessary to set the options of the brush to use this features, open Brush setting by [Brush - Brush…], and checked [Hand Shake Correct])

□ version 1.22.10
 
 - Improve thumbnail image of the Gallery
 - Arbitrarily set to the path of Image Output and Gallery
 (Need to edit [/mnt/sdcard/CloverPaint/iopath.ini] by text editor)

□ version 1.22.11
 
 - Bug fix: Not save Screen Rotate option

□ version 1.22.20
 
 - Specification Change: The key-shortcut will be interpreted as two separate events when the set to [holding] and [click]
 - Implemented: A text resource switching process by the resource file that was placed in the application folder local
 Please to get resource file (strings.xml) from following:
 https://github.com/CloverPaint/CloverMemo

□ version 1.22.30
 
 - Improved: Operability of the Shape Tools

□ version 1.22.40
 
 - Blend modes were added. Hue, Saturation, Color and Luminance.

□ version 1.22.41
 
 - Bug fix: calculation of the new Blend mode

□ version 1.22.42
 
 - Some bug fix and improvement

□ version 1.22.43
 
 - Fixed: some jpeg image can not be read
 - Added: smoothing type of the stroke
 - Improved: rendering process

□ version 1.22.44
 
 - Bug fixed: Hang-up in the rare case when the pen stroke is drawing

□ version 1.22.45
 
 - Bug fix: Deadlock is sometimes occur when using the Move tool
 - Improved: rendering process

□ version 1.22.50
 
 - Added: free deform mode to the Transform tool
 - Bug fix: hang-up when using the Merge all

□ version 1.22.51
 
 - Bug fix: about 2-pass pen stroke
 - Improved: orientation effect of the pen becomes include screen rotation of the EfT option

□ version 1.23
 
 ■ [EfT] Implemented Post-Stroke Editor
 - The stroke you just draw, can process move or bend, change of the brush setting
 (After the drawing of pen stroke, boot by selecting [Tools - Pen - PS.Edit])
 (EfT-UI is required to use this feature)
 - Added : Create of the Save/Select/Move tools icon

□ version 1.23.10
 
 - [EfT]Implemented Move(Hand) window

□ version 1.23.11
 
 - Improved: Camera manipulation by the shortcut

□ version 1.23.12
 
 - [Non EfT] Buf fix: After transform apply, clear sel-range and merge-down had been forced

□ version 1.23.13
 
 - Bug fix: About clover docking

□ version 1.23.20
 
 - Supported: Screen rotation by the system
 - Supported: Complete full screen mode which disappeared the navbar [Required KitKat]
 (the navbar is displayed again with long press the BACK key)

□ version 1.23.22
 
 - Revert previous version temporarily (problem has occurred in some terminals)

□ version 1.23.23
 
 - Reimplement: Screen rotation by the system
 - Improved: Hit test of the transform tools button at using [Pointer setting] option set to [Finger].

□ version 1.23.24
 
 - Bug-fix: Initialization failure

□ version 1.23.25
 
 - Fixed a problem that will not boot at some terminal

□ version 1.23.26
 
 - Bug-fix: hang when select the saturation blend mode in some images

□ version 1.23.27
 
 - Billing API update to v3

□ version 1.23.28
 
 - Create application folders

□ version 1.23.30
 
 - The problem fix that will not boot at some terminals
 - Some of the specifications of screen rotation was modified

□ version 1.23.35
 
 - Added: the image format of compression
 (It is possible to switch ON/OFF from the option dialog)

□ version 1.23.36
 
 - The problem fix that will not boot at some terminals
 - Improved drawing performance

□ version 1.24
 
 ■ Implemented Ruler tool
 - Supports Android 5.0 Lollipop

□ version 1.24.01
 
 - Bug fix: Could not assign a ruler clover icon to the Clover List

□ version 1.24.10
 
 - [EfT]Implemented Local Clover Box window

□ version 1.24.11
 
 - [EfT]Modified the specification of the reset parameter of the Clover in the Local Clover Box window at time of reselecting
 - [EfT]Mitigate the billing information check conditions of the EfT
 - [EfT]Added an option switch to vanished the frame completely when the EfT window frame transparent

□ version 1.24.20
 
 - Added display grid (you can setting this function from the option)
